data.title: OECD Review of The Corporate Governance of State Owned Enterprises Croatia
data.meta_description: OECD-Review-of-the-Corporate-Governance-of-State-Owned-Enterprises-Croatia - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an overview and assessment of corporate governance practices in Croatia's state-owned enterprise sector relative to OECD guidelines. It begins with background on Croatia's economic and political context and the characteristics of its SOE sector, including the number and types of SOEs, their size and sectors. It then examines Croatia's legal framework for SOEs and the country's ownership arrangements and responsibilities regarding SOEs. The document evaluates several aspects of Croatia's SOE governance and provides conclusions and recommendations to further align practices with OECD standards.
data.text: OECD Review of The Corporate Governance of State Owned Enterprises Croatia
